content.eamr: ( ing-9 "2 English muffins, split and toasted" )

content.text: 0) In a bowl, combine the eggs, crackers, celery and pimientos.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@14:21 / AC
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a bowl"@6:12 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the eggs"@22:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "crackers"@32:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "celery"@42:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "pimientos"@53:62 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In another bowl, combine the mayonnaise, milk, salt, garlic salt and pepper; mix well.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the mayonnaise"@28:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "milk"@44:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@50:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "garlic salt"@56:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "pepper"@72:78 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "another bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "mix"@80:83 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Spoon about 1/3 cup onto each muffin half; place on an ungreased baking sheet.
4) Broil for 3-4 minutes or until lightly browned.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Broil"@3:8 / AC
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "3-4 minutes"@13:24 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until lightly browned"@28:49 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
